org.locationtech.geowave.core.index.text

Class BasicTextDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.index.text.BasicTextDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexConstraints, MultiDimensionalIndexData<String>, Persistable, MultiDimensionalTextData

    public class BasicTextDataset
extends Object
implements MultiDimensionalTextData
    The Basic Index Result class creates an object associated with a generic query. This class can be used when the dimensions and/or axis are generic.
